metadata.title: CVE-2020-11823 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In Dolibarr 10.0.6, if USER_LOGIN_FAILED is active, there is a stored XSSvulnerability on the admin tools --> audit page. This may lead to stealingof the admin account.

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
